name: Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix
description: Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition, the most critically acclaimed street racing title ever, is back and supercharge-upgraded with Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition REMIX. Everything that made the original release a PlayStation 2 Computer Entertainment System Greatest Hit and an Xbox Platinum Hit, plus an entirely new additional city, over 20 new licensed vehicles, an expanded soundtrack, and more...
